basics.name: Amir Ali Jiwani
basics.label: Software Craftsman
basics.summary:
A software enthusiast.

I have been working as a developer for around a decade. During this time, I have got a chance to visit various domains and technologies -- Which helped in shaping my self on how I think and work now.

I like to create software and helping other developers like me around. Recently have gained interest in making more layman talks than the development intensive, as I believe everyone attached to a concept should have a right to understand it in complete and concise way.

Some recent technologies I have been working are NodeJS, React, Docker, Kubernetes, Electron and other of such kind. My main focus is towards the problem solving, irrespective of the platform.

location.address: A1-17-03, Vista Komanwel A, Jalan Jalil Perkasa 19

work.name: Pied Piper
work.summary: Pied Piper is a multi-platform technology based on a proprietary universal compression algorithm that has consistently fielded high Weisman Scores™ that are not merely competitive, but approach the theoretical limit of lossless compression.
highlights: Build an algorithm for artist to detect if their music was violating copy right infringement laws
Optimized an algorithm that holds the current world record for Weisman Scores

volunteer.summary: Global movement of free coding clubs for young people.

publications.name: Video compression for 3d media
publications.summary: Innovative middle-out compression algorithm that changes the way we store data.
